oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Ensure SELinux Not Disabled in the kernel arguments
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Ensure selinux=0 argument is not present in the 'options' line of /boot/loader/entries/ostree-2-*.conf (or ostree-1-*.conf if there is no ostree-2-*.conf as ostree has only two enries at the most, with *-2-*.conf entry always being the most recent). Also, ensure that kernel is currently running with this argument by checking /proc/cmdline.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Pass if there are no files matching pattern '/boot/loader/entries/ostree-2-.*.conf' exist in the system
Check if argument selinux=0 for Linux kernel is not present in /boot/loader/entries/ostree-1-.*.conf
Check if argument selinux=0 for Linux kernel is not present in /boot/loader/entries/ostree-2-.*.conf
Check if argument selinux=0 for Linux kernel is not present in /proc/cmdline
